entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
